results.name: It Lurks! A Noir Horror RPG.

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8, 8.1, 10 or 11 (32 or 64 bit)
  • Processor: Intel Pentium 4 or AMD Athlon XP
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1280 x 960 High Color +
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes
  • Additional Notes: Can be played with keyboard or compatible game controller (X-box 360 controller recommended. Other game controllers might not be fully compatible). If wanting to play with a game controller, it should be plugged in before launching the game, otherwise the game may not recognize it.
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 or 11 (32 or 64 bit)
  • Processor: Intel Pentium 4 or AMD Athlon XP or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1920 x 1080 pixels High Color + or better.
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes
  • Additional Notes: Can be played with keyboard or compatible game controller (X-box 360 controller recommended. Other game controllers might not be fully compatible). If wanting to play with a game controller, it should be plugged in before launching the game, otherwise the game may not recognize it.

results.name: As Long As It's Not Illegal: ACT I (itch)

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 64 bits or higher
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-3330 @ 3.2GHz or AMD Ryzen 5 2600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 6gb or Amd RX 570 4gb
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 17 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible audio card
  • Additional Notes: Best experienced with headphones
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64 bits or higher
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i5-9400F CPU @ 2.90GHz or AMD Ryzen 5 3400
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1660Ti 6gb or Amd RX 580 8gb
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 17 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible audio card
  • Additional Notes: Best experienced with headphones
